subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] new font released
msgSnippet: Only just got around to checking this.  It works great, Thoth installs just fine now.  Thanks very much! oliver
messageBody:
Only just got around to checking this. It works great, Thoth
installs just fine now. Thanks very much!

oliver

On Fri 2007.11.02, at 17:01, Paul Tremblay wrote:
> ... but more importantly for your sake, I
> use so-called hinting with one font; that should create a hinting
> table,
> and font book should not complain. I uploaded the font to the same
> place
> as before (in the files=> fonts folder in the mailing list), so if you
> could give it a try, I'd appreciate it.
>
> Paul
>
>
